Job Description: Trainee Analyst ECG, for a Healthcare company in New Delhi, The candidates will be given training on Anatomy, Physiology, Functions of the Heart and Cardiac Rhythm.Undergo classroom education 3 weeks (max subject to attendance) on No cost basis.Required Candidate profileTraining: Successful outcome of the preliminary education training, candidate will be offered paid trainee-ship, period of 4 months on a stipend of Rs.10K pm. After that They will be paid 3 Lakhs
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Bio-Chemistry/Bio-Technology, Biomedical, B.Sc in Hospitality and Hotel Management, Bio-Chemistry, Biology, Microbiology, Botany, Chemistry, B.Pharma in Any Specialization
